name: The 6th Side DEMO
description:
A new world...

or an odd universe...

or a game where you control a cube and fail the same level over and over again...

-The 6th Side- DEMO

How to download?

01. First click "download" 

02. Open file location of downloaded folder

03. Right click and hit "Extract All " on the folder

04. Open the new unzipped folder and click the file with the name 

"The 6th Side DEMO"

Controls?

F- Respawn

WASD or ARROW  KEYS- Movement

SPACE- Jump

ESCAPE- Pause
